item.title: Lucy's Time Cut Story Creates Another Massive Tragedy For Her Original Timeline That Everyone Ignores
item.description: Lucy's time traveling in Time Cut lead to changes in both the past and the present, and some of them have sad repercussions for Lucy and her family.

item.title: John Wick Interview: David Leitch Credits The Franchise With Teaching Him That Sometimes "Less Is More"
item.description: John Wick co-creator David Leitch celebrates the franchise's 10th anniversary by reminiscing on the lessons he learned working with Keanu Reeves.

item.title: Alien: Romulus Streaming Release Date Revealed
item.description: The official streaming release date is revealed for Alien: Romulus, which became the franchise's second highest-grossing installment earlier in 2024.
